text: Rewatching this after the infection episode, it is absolutely crazy how much this and the other endings forshadowed so incredibly much, without any of us seeing it. I never thought I would say this when I watched that first mlp shitpost thats now long gone, but this is truly top tier stuff. Thank you for making such an amazing series Tamers, and thank you for not giving up after youtube tried to stop you. This whole journey was truly worth it. I hope you will keep going for many more years to come.
